This page tracks the packaging work related to the UMC project.

== LIRC ==

The Debian LIRC team has been contacted for:
* installing the lirc.hwdb, that will be generated as of lirc 0.8.2,
* action synchronization with the Kernel team once the LIRC drivers are merged into the mainline Linux, and provided by the Debian kernel

For more information, refer to the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RemoteControls|Remote Controls]]</nowiki> specification.
